mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Symington, John to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Symington, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Allegheny Arsenal 1861. By Telegraph from Pittsburgh 3 1861. All horse equipments are sent to Washington by order as fast as made John Symington Col Ordnance 13W41Col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Symington, John
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Allegheny Arsenal
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
